FRIDAY_MORNING: ^Here we go again. Time for the weekend!

c: ^Ugh my teeth feel disgusting... I'm so tired.
^It's been a really heavy week. Maybe I should ask Cashbags Michael if I can have a bit of time off... Some time with my babies.
^Last week's experiments went really well, probably the best yet! Hopefully I'll be able to repeat the same success this week.
^Last week's experiments were a total disaster. I really don't know why I bother doing this anymore. They all die anyway.
^Breakfast is a holy ritual. There's something so beautiful about it. The most important meal of the day.
^I feel so clean! Clean as a freshly polished apple with no worms in sight.
^That felt great! I'm an empty vessel ready for more food!
^Ah, creation. Planting my seed. Carving life out of the damp clay of possibilities. A tepid swamp of genetics, writhing and wriggling, waiting for my command.
^Time to choose three DNA traits to combine.
^I don't know how many times I have brought life into this world, but every time, it brings a tear to my eye. My sweet beautiful children, I love to see you grow.

^This seems like a pretty feeble specimen. I wonder what I did wrong? No matter how carefully I pick the DNA for my babies, it seems that the most important part of creating life is love. I need to find more time to give more love.
^I wish I could think of something more poetic to say to you, but alas, Leafy Paul is too tired tonight.
^See you tomorrow! I wonder how you will look. I wonder who you will become.

FRIDAY_NOON: ^Ok! Creation done. What was it I always do next?
^Water the plant, feed it, put a tape in the cassette player to play it some music overnight.
